name: Acrobatics
description: Your Dexterity (Acrobatics) check covers your attempt to stay on your feet in a tricky situation, such as when you're trying to run across a sheet of ice, balance on a tightrope, or stay upright on a rocking ship's deck. The DM might also call for a Dexterity (Acrobatics) check to see whether you can perform acrobatic stunts, including dives, rolls, somersaults, and flips.
typicalUses: Keep your balance on a narrow or unstable surface
Perform acrobatic stunts such as dives, rolls, and flips
Escape from being grappled (contest vs Athletics)
Land safely from a fall with a controlled tumble
